Name: Pan Cheng Peng
Text: Use in 2.10 Kotodama Mode

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph. I've beaten the underlings, so I might as well beat the boss. You've been causing trouble for so long. Here comes your punishment!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Where does this yapping toddler come from? Shut up and die!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Tsk-tsk-tsk. Not bad, kid.

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Now, time to show you what a master can do!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Burning Palms!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Thunder Crash!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Why is it on fire?!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! That's not all!

Name: Pulao
Text: You want to threaten me with a party trick?

Name: Pulao
Text: Super <size=30>Duper</size> <size=40>Ultimate</size> Flame Dance!

Name: Pulao
Text: Super <size=30>Duper</size> <size=40>Ultimate</size> Thunderclap!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: S-sorcery!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Dammit! I can't take it any longer!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Stop! Stop! I don't want to fight anymore!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Your crimes can't be that easily forgiven!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Mercy! Mercy! Spare my life!

Name: Pulao
Text: I'm bringing you to justice today!

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Stop.

Name: Pulao
Text: Dodged it! Score increased!

Name: Pulao
Text: Successful Parry!

Name: Lee
Text: Veggie

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Perfect dodge without invincibility.

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Completed basic attack animation.

Name: Pulao
Text: Bonus score: Return successfully.

Name: Pulao
Text: Bonus score: Consecutive Overclocks within 15s.

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Received 15 hits!

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Cleared same-colored Signal Orbs in succession

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Cleared Signal Orbs of 3 different colors in succession

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Performed Enhanced Basic Attack

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Performed Enhanced Ping Attack

Name: Pulao
Text: Score increased: Performed Enhanced Special Attack

Name: Mystery Person
Text: This man is still of use to me. You should leave.

Name: Pulao
Text: Who are you? Why are you standing up for this bunch of thieves?

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Are you trying to become my enemy?

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! I can tell that pineapple head of yours is up to no good. Take your shot!

Name: Mystery Person
Text: <color=#FF821C>Champion's Spirit</color>!

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Stay here. Let me teach this child a lesson.

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Let me show you my <color=#FF821C>Overlord's Spirit</color>!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: This pressure... I can't take it anymore!

Name: Pulao
Text: Do you think <color=#FF821C>Champion's Spirit</color> is enough to protect your guy?

Name: Pulao
Text: Let me show you my <color=#FF821C>Overlord's Spirit</color>!

Name: Pulao
Text: This pressure is nothing. <color=#FF821C>Champion's Spirit</color>!

Name: Pulao
Text: <color=#FF821C>Champion's Spirit</color>? That's nothing. Watch this!

Name: Pulao
Text: This pressure is nothing. Don't underestimate me...

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Help me!

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Where's your honor?! You're fighting dirty!

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Fine. There's no reason for me to be lenient, then. Behold! <size=30>Palm of Infinity</size>!

Name: Pulao
Text: What?!

Name: Mystery Person
Text: You're quite a bothersome child.

Name: Mystery Person
Text: I shall try my special attack—<size=30>Slash of Eternity</size>!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Help—

Name: Mystery Person
Text: Quiet! Don't disturb me.

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: How dare you ambush me, kid?!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: You have no honor!

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Stop hitting me! Stop! I'm sorry! It was my fault...

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Cough...

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Cough... cough...

Name: Bandit Leader
Text: Sir... You're almost... there...

Name: Master
Text: Pulao, you've studied with me for years, and your foundation is solid. Today, I shall teach you our school's secret techniques.

Name: Master
Text: Study hard, and you shall become formidable one day.

Name: Pulao
Text: Yes, Master.

Name: Master
Text: Hm... Your training is over. You shall depart and acquire experience in the real world.

Name: Master
Text: An evil cult is causing trouble in the world right now. Your journey will be treacherous, so you must be careful.

Name: Pulao
Text: Yes, Master. Pulao will remember your teachings.

Name: Pulao
Text: Huh! What kind of scoundrel dares to cause trouble in broad daylight?!

Name: Bandit
Text: Here to throw your life away? Guys, let's beat her up!

Name: Bandit
Text: This kid is strong!

Name: Bandit
Text: Guys, run!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! That should teach you!

Name: Bandit Minion
Text: Boss, she was the one who kicked our butts! QAQ

Name: Bandit Captain
Text: How dare you beat up my guys?! I'm going to teach you a lesson!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! If you're not willing to change, my fists will make you!

Name: Bandit Captain
Text: How dare you beat up my people?! This is the end of you!

Name: Pulao
Text: I, Pulao, am someone who repays grudges with kindness, my friends.

Name: Pulao
Text: Follow me, and I'll make sure your bellies are always full.

Name: Bandit Minion
Text: Sister Pulao is right! Let's work for Sister Pulao from now on!

Name: Bandit Captain
Text: You traitors!

Name: Bandit Captain
Text: Dammit! You got lucky today!

Name: Bandit Captain
Text: I'll be back!

Name: Pulao
Text: I... What is this place?

Name: Pulao
Text: Who are you?!

Name: Pulao
Text: This energy...?! I can't move!

Name: Hermit
Text: You're talented, but your energy is lacking.

Name: Pulao
Text: I can feel my power bursting out of me!

Name: Pulao
Text: What's going on? I feel like I'm out of energy!

Name: Hermit
Text: You're talented, but you're too slow.

Name: Pulao
Text: I feel light on my feet!

Name: Pulao
Text: Argh, I have to stop. I'm too tired!

Name: Pulao
Text: Thank you for your guidance. Pulao is grateful!

Name: Hermit
Text: You're quite gifted. Follow me.

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! You phantoms are not match for me.

Name: Pulao
Text: Come on! I'll fight ten of you!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! You phantoms are not match for me.

Name: Pulao
Text: Who else is there? Come on!

Name: Pulao
Text: Is that it? Is there anyone better than this?

Name: Pulao
Text: Ouch! It hurts!

Name: Pulao
Text: ****! Where's your honor?!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Cultist Elder
Text: What kind of rascal dares to invade our sanctuary?!

Name: Pulao
Text: Your cult has tormented the world long enough. I, Pulao, will deliver justice today!

Name: Cultist Elder
Text: Disciples! Perform the Polaris Serpent Ritual!

Name: Cultist
Text: Yes, sir!

Name: Pulao
Text: Whoa! You have some tricks up your sleeves, don't you?

Name: Pulao
Text: Let's see what your stupid dragon can do!

Name: Cultist Elder
Text: O-our leader won't let you get away...

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: I've been waiting for you.

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Why don't you join us? I'll grant you the seat of an elder.

Name: Pulao
Text: Tch! Your reign of evil is over. Prepare to die!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Ha! Admirable. Let's see what you got!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Secret technique—<color=#FFC125>Desolation of the Three Realms</color>!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Let me show you the power of my <color=#FFC125>Meteoric Tranquility</color>!

Name: Pulao
Text: How did you know one of the secret techniques? Could you be the traitorous student of our school?!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Hah, that's right. You're the first person to see my secret technique!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Let's make this quick. It's time to show my hand!

Name: Pulao
Text: Secret technique—<color=#FFC125>Seven Cleansing Fists</color>!

Name: <color=#C0FF3E>Ultimate FIghter</color>
Text: <color=#FF3030><size=20>Battle Power</size></color>: <color=#FF3030>9</color><color=#FF8C00>9</color><color=#FFEC8B>9</color><color=#B3EE3A>9</color><color=#98F5FF>9</color><color=#436EEE>9</color><color=#8A2BE2>9</color>

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: W-what?! Are you trying to kill us both?!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Attack! Anyone who flees <size=32><color=#FF0000>dies!</color></size>

Name: Cultist
Text: Guys! With Pulao's help, we can finally take our revenge!

Name: Cultist
Text: Charge—

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Hah! I knew it. Useless vermins.

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Is this all you've got?

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Hah. Time to end this game.

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: <size=32><color=#FF3030>Great!</color> <color=#FF8C00>Ruin!</color> <color=#FFEC8B>Meteor!</color> <color=#B3EE3A>Strike!</color></size>

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Not bad! You dodged it once, but can you dodge it again?

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Let's see how many more times you can dodge it!
<size=30><color=#FF3030>Warning! Warning! Warning!</color></size>
Massive energy signature en route.

Name: Pulao
Text: No! I <color=#FF821C>can't block this directly</color>!

Name: Cultist
Text: Run, guys! Run!!!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Tsk, tsk. Let's see how long you can last.

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Wait... What? Why?!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: I can't control my energy anymore! Aaargh!!!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: I can't believe I've lost to you after all these years of work!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: I'm... so mad...

Name: Pulao
Text: That's karma. I hope I haven't disappointed you, Master.

Name: Pulao
Text: Now that the cult is defeated, the world can know peace again.

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: Cough... If I keep expanding... I'll...

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: I see... I can't believe that old man came up with this...

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph, traitor! You reap what you sow!

Name: Cultist Leader
Text: I'll take you down with me!

Name: Pulao
Text: No! He's going to explode!

Name: <color=#C0FF3E>Berserk Mode</color>
Text: <color=#FF3030><size=20>Parry Incoming</size></color> <color=#FF3030>120</color>

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! Pulao is unstoppable!

Name: Elder
Text: I will be the examiner for this trial. Though our faction teaches all who wish to learn, the path to enlightenment remains arduous.

Name: Elder
Text: Not all are destined to attain greatness. I urge you to remain humble and steadfast in spirit, while keeping a calm heart and mind.

Name: Elder
Text: Oh? Impressive talent—an affinity for both thunder and flame.

Name: Elder
Text: Such steady breath control and exceptional physical form. A gifted one!

Name: Elder
Text: *sigh* You possess neither elemental affinity nor any special talents.

Name: Elder
Text: Best give up any thoughts of cultivation and transcendence.

Name: Pulao
Text: ...You're not just making all of this up, are you?

Name: Elder
Text: Oh? My friend, your talent is most impressive. Join our faction and you shall shine bright.

Name: Pulao
Text: I knew it! The cheat code is working!

Name: Elder
Text: Th-this is...! My, my, dear friend. From where do you hail, and under which master did you train?

Name: Elder
Text: Are your family members in good health? You may bring them along—our faction shall care for them all.

Name: Pulao
Text: ...? Are you really a legitimate faction? You're not just some sketchy group, right?

Name: Elder
Text: Hmph... Such an ignorant little rascal, you have no idea what you're dealing with.

Name: Elder
Text: Today, I shall teach you the real meaning of transcendence!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmph! You're all talk and no bite! Watch me counter your pathetic techniques!

Name: Elder
Text: I see you possess remarkable potential and extraordinary movement skills, young one.

Name: Elder
Text: Care to cross blades with an old man?

Name: Pulao
Text: Please grant me your guidance!

Name: Elder
Text: To cultivate your soul, one must first cultivate the mind—for mind, nature, and destiny are one.

Name: Elder
Text: Even the slightest deviation cannot be accepted.

Name: Pulao
Text: D-damn it! What kind of monster are we dealing with?

Name: Pulao
Text: I... I won't give up here, not yet!

Name: Elder
Text: Bold yet resilient—excellent!

Name: Elder
Text: Let's see what you're really made of.

Name: Elder
Text: How's this for a move?

Name: Hanying
Text: Master?! Why are you fighting with your disciple?

Name: Pulao
Text: Master? You... are you the Faction Grand Master?

Name: Elder
Text: Heh, I am the Grand Master, indeed. Tell me... would you like to be my last disciple?

Name: Pulao
Text: I... I pay my respects to you, Master!

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, there's something off about the mountain's aura. We must proceed with caution.

Name: Pulao
Text: Eek... This place creeps me out.

Name: Hanying
Text: Don't be scared. I'll be here with you.

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, there's something off about the mountain's aura. We must proceed with caution.

Name: Pulao
Text: Hey, there's nothing to fear! If any demons dare show up, I'll cut them down!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hanying, this place is odd. We must be very careful.

Name: Hanying
Text: Yes. This mission won't be easy, and we don't know what we might encounter.

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, look out!

Name: Pulao
Text: Ugh... where did all of them come from?!

Name: Pulao
Text: Take this! And this! And THIS!

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, look out!

Name: Pulao
Text: Ha! You sneaky bastard.

Name: Pulao
Text: Have a taste of THIS!

Name: Hanying
Text: I can't believe how savage these monsters are.

Name: Pulao
Text: Something big must have happened in these mountains. We need to go deeper.

Name: Pulao
Text: The mountain beasts are unnaturally aggressive. Something must be controlling their minds.

Name: Hanying
Text: We must report this to the base immediately.

Name: Hanying
Text: Nine-Cycle Revival Herb in a place like this? Could this be what's agitating the beasts?

Name: Pulao
Text: Who cares? Let's beat it up—and the sacred herb will be ours!

Name: Hanying
Text: Ugh! This beast's malevolent energy is overwhelming—it's no ordinary creature. Be careful!

Name: Hanying
Text: Nine-Cycle Revival Herb in a place like this? Could this be what's agitating the beasts?

Name: Pulao
Text: Hanying, I'll draw its attention—grab the sacred herb when you can!

Name: Hanying
Text: Listen... Pulao, please be careful. If things get too dangerous, retreat immediately!

Name: Savage Beast
Text: GRRRAAAHHH...!!!

Name: Pulao
Text: Tch... This is harder than I thought...

Name: Hanying
Text: Hang in there, Pulao.

Name: Hanying
Text: Let's take it down together.

Name: Savage Beast
Text: (Enraged) GRRRAAAHHH...!!!

Name: Pulao
Text: Watch out! The beast has gone mad!

Name: Hanying
Text: I'll hold it off!

Name: Hanying
Text: Quick, grab the sacred herb!

Name: Pulao
Text: *phew*... That was close, but we finally got the sacred herb.

Name: Hanying
Text: Good job back there! Legend has it that this herb has the power to breathe life back into the dead.

Name: Host
Text: Let the decennial Martial Arts Tournament begin.

Name: Disciples
Text: Heh heh, today we'll show everyone what we're made of.

Name: Disciples
Text: I'll be taking that victory!

Name: Pulao
Text: Wow... What a crowd. Even the hermits who've been in hiding for years are here.

Name: Host
Text: Let the decennial Martial Arts Tournament begin.

Name: Pulao
Text: Lame. Not a single opponent worth my time.

Name: Disciples
Text: Hah, big talk! Don't be begging for mercy when we meet in the ring.

Name: Host
Text: Now approaching the ring... is the direct disciple of the Grand Master!

Name: Host
Text: Hailed as the rising star of the faction, the beast-hunting expert, the vanguard of herb gathering... (several thousand titles omitted)

Name: Host
Text: The one and only... Pulao!

Name: Host
Text: Let's see what amazing surprises she has in store for us!

Name: Pulao
Text: Uh... Was that introduction a bit too much?

Name: Pulao
Text: They're really putting on the pressure, huh?

Name: Pulao
Text: Everyone! Hear me out. Instead of everyone getting hurt—

Name: Pulao
Text: —why don't we set aside our differences and work together for victory!

Name: Disciples
Text: ...Fine, I'll trust you this once!

Name: Host
Text: This... an unexpected alliance has formed in the arena!

Name: Hanying
Text: So you're Pulao?

Name: Hanying
Text: Let's see what you've got.

Name: Pulao
Text: Show me what you've got!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hehe, you're too kind!

Name: Host
Text: Pulao lives up to her reputation with an effortless victory in this match.

Name: Host
Text: And that concludes the preliminaries! Stay tuned for a spectacular finale!

Name: Hanying
Text: Their reputation is well-deserved—I was wrong to doubt them. I admit defeat.

Name: Pulao
Text: Thank you! Hehe, you're too kind!

Name: Host
Text: And that concludes the preliminaries! Stay tuned for a spectacular finale!

Name: Host
Text: The Martial Arts Tournament has finally reached its most intense championship match!

Name: Host
Text: Now in the ring are: Pulao, the faction's rising star, against Gabriel, this year's dark horse!

Name: Host
Text: Who will emerge victorious? Let the battle begin!

Name: Gabriel
Text: A rising star? Heh, perfect. Exactly the ones I love to crush.

Name: Pulao
Text: Interesting. Let's see if you can even last three moves.

Name: Pulao
Text: Take this! Cosmic Thunder Palm!

Name: Gabriel
Text: Is that all you've got?

Name: Pulao
Text: What?!

Name: Pulao
Text: Take this! Soulfire Palm!

Name: Gabriel
Text: Pathetic tricks.

Name: Pulao
Text: His movements are strange... Unlike any techniques I know.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Hehehe... Countless souls, heed my command!

Name: Gabriel
Text: Now die! Consider it an honor that you managed to force me to use this!

Name: Elder
Text: T-that... That is a forbidden dark art!

Name: Pulao
Text: Don't underestimate me!

Name: Gabriel
Text: I... I refuse to accept this!

Name: Grand Master
Text: Gabriel! You dare practice the forbidden dark arts for the sake of victory? Where are the Enforcer Elders? Seize him! Take him to the dungeons for interrogation!

Name: Pulao
Text: *exhales* So he was using forbidden techniques... Good thing I managed to stay one step ahead.

Name: Host
Text: Uh... well... *ahem*! Let us congratulate Pulao, our rising star, for winning this year's martial arts championship!

Name: Hanying
Text: The ancient realm opens once every hundred years. Legend says it's the burial ground of an ancient family.

Name: Hanying
Text: We must exercise extreme caution while exploring it.

Name: Pulao
Text: Don't worry, Hanying. I'll make sure everything will be fine.

Name: Faction Elite
Text: Huh? You're... Pulao, the champion? I'm so sorry... my bad!

Name: Faction Elite
Text: The path to ascension is at stake! We can't miss this chance—attack!

Name: Pulao
Text: Perfect timing!

Name: Pulao
Text: Let's see what you're made of!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hanying, we can't afford to drag this fight out.

Name: Pulao
Text: Use the traps to shake them off our tails.

Name: Hanying
Text: Got it!

Name: Faction Elite
Text: You're not going anywhere!

Name: Pulao
Text: *panting* They're too powerful... If only I were stronger...

Name: Hanying
Text: Don't blame yourself, Pulao. We must press on, or someone else might claim the ancient realm's treasures before us.

Name: Pulao
Text: Heh, heh, we lost them, right? Just wait until we get out of here—you'll all pay for this!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hanying, over here! I've found a hidden passage—it looks untouched.

Name: Hanying
Text: This is... I had no idea you have such a keen spiritual sense!

Name: Hanying
Text: This ancient realm holds wonders untold—sacred herbs that would fetch a fortune in the outside world blanket the ground as far as the eye can see.

Name: Hanying
Text: Wait... these tracks... an otherworldly beast?!

Name: Otherworldly Beast
Text: GRRRAAAHHH...!!!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hanying, look out!!

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao!

Name: Pulao
Text: Ow, ow, ow, that hurts!

Name: Pulao
Text: This thing's got one heck of a bite!

Name: Pulao
Text: This doesn't make sense. Why is this otherworldly beast here?
AAAHHH—! (screams in pain)

Name: Hanying
Text: This is bad—quick, to the depths of the ancient realm!

Name: Otherworldly Beast
Text: GRRRAAAHHH... (bites)

Name: Fallen Ally
Text: H-help... Please... Help...! (ToT )

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, quick, help them!

Name: Pulao
Text: Silence, you wretched beast!

Name: Pulao
Text: *panting* We finally made it out... Hanying, what's wrong?

Name: Hanying
Text: Our fellow disciples...

Name: Pulao
Text: This isn't the time for that, Hanying. That was clearly a trap. We must report back at once.

Name: Pulao
Text: Ugh—!

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, don't push yourself too hard.

Name: Hanying
Text: Let's break through together!

Name: Pulao
Text: *panting* We finally made it out... Hanying, what's wrong?

Name: Hanying
Text: Our fellow disciples...

Name: Pulao
Text: This isn't the time for that, Hanying. That was clearly a trap. We must report back at once.

Name: Fellow Survivors
Text: I am eternally grateful for your help. Your great kindness will never be forgotten!

Name: Pulao
Text: Thank heavens you're alive... That's all that matters.

Name: Hanying
Text: Otherworldly beings are invading. Please return and report to your faction at once.

Name: Fellow Survivors
Text: Yes, on it!!!

Name: Grand Master
Text: Still no word from the outside world... I fear the other factions have met with the same fate.

Name: Grand Master
Text: Disciples, heed my command! Follow me into battle! We shall vanquish those demons!

Name: Disciples
Text: Yes, Master!

Name: Grand Master
Text: Pulao, guard Wuwei Peak with your unit. It's the key point for our formation—we cannot afford to lose it!

Name: Pulao
Text: At your command, Master!

Name: Grand Master
Text: An otherworldly invasion—this is a catastrophe of immense scale. Hanying, you must alert the other factions and tell them to prepare and find reinforcements.

Name: Hanying
Text: At your command, Master!

Name: Grand Master
Text: The rest of you, follow me into battle! We shall vanquish those demons! Pulao, go and guard the key point for our formation—we cannot afford to lose it!

Name: Disciples
Text: Yes, Master!

Name: Hub
Text: Hostile creature attack detected.

Name: Hub
Text: Annihilation mode activated!

Name: Pulao
Text: ...Am I really needed to protect this thing?

Name: Pulao
Text: They just keep coming! There's no end to this!

Name: Hub
Text: *beep* Initiating Security Protocol 2.

Name: Pulao
Text: ...? You're quite the jack of all trades.

Name: Pulao
Text: *exhales* Good, the last one's down. The hub is secure now. How's the situation at the front line?

Name: Disciples
Text: Hanying, I regret to report that the beasts are gathering for an all-out assault. I fear our formation won't...

Name: Pulao
Text: Disciples, heed my command! Follow me into battle!

Name: Disciples
Text: Yes, Master!

Name: Hanying
Text: The faction is in dire straits. You must bring back reinforcements.

Name: Hanying
Text: Come to think of it, there sure are a lot of people asking for help...

Name: Hanying
Text: How did half the faction's disciples end up here?!

Name: Hanying
Text: We must hurry back with the reinforcements.

Name: Hanying
Text: Grand Master, Pulao, hold on!

Name: Disciples
Text: I swear to protect Hanying with my life!

Name: Disciples
Text: Attack!

Name: Hanying
Text: Be careful! Leave the fight as soon as you can!

Name: Disciples
Text: You can do it, Hanying!

Name: Disciples
Text: Hanying, that was amazing!

Name: Disciples
Text: Hanying, how much longer do you need?

Name: Hanying
Text: Don't just stand there, help me out!!!

Name: Hanying
Text: Finally breaking through the enemy blockade.

Name: Hanying
Text: Pulao, everyone, hang in there! I'm coming with reinforcements!

Name: Grand Master
Text: Elders, heed my command! Form the Grand Thunder Formation!

Name: Elders
Text: Yes, on it!!!

Name: Hanying
Text: Disciples, heed my command! The fate of our faction rests in your hands!

Name: Hanying
Text: Charge!!

Name: Grand Master
Text: Qu, lead the disciples to hold off the beasts!

Name: Grand Master
Text: Elders, form the Nine Suns Formation!

Name: Hanying
Text: Disciples, heed my command! The fate of our faction rests in your hands!

Name: Hanying
Text: Charge!!

Name: Pulao
Text: Charge forward with Hanying!

Name: Hanying
Text: Let's gooo! (>o<)

Name: Disciples
Text: Charge! Keep going!

Name: Lord
Text: GRAAAHHH...! CRUSH THEM ALL!

Name: Lord
Text: Worthless insects.

Name: Lord
Text: A swarm of ants trying to topple a tree. How pathetic.

Name: Hanying
Text: You're pathetic!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hanying, I'm here to help!

Name: Lord
Text: This... can't be... possible...!

Name: Lord
Text: I... Did I just lose?

Name: Hanying
Text: Time to teach you a lesson.

Name: Hanying
Text: The lives in this world are not lambs for you to slaughter!

Name: Pulao
Text: We did it!
